description:
net: fix garbage connection close in dual stack tests

This may possibly be the root cause of flaky dual stack tests.

Update issue 4176
Update issue 5001

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
